sentence.text: Has Ian sold his house yet?
sentence.textCn: 伊恩已把他的房子卖掉了吗？

sentence.text: Yes, he has. He sold it last week.
sentence.textCn: 是的，卖掉了。他上星期卖掉的。

sentence.text: Has he moved to his new house yet?
sentence.textCn: 他已经迁进新房子了吗？

sentence.text: No, not yet. He's still here. He's going to move tomorrow.
sentence.textCn: 还没有。他仍在这里。他打算明天搬家。

sentence.text: I'll miss him. He has always been a good neighbour.
sentence.textCn: 我会想念他的。他一直是个好邻居。

sentence.text: He's a very nice person. We'll all miss him.
sentence.textCn: 他是个非常好的人，我们大家都会想念他的。

sentence.text: When will the new people move into this house?
sentence.textCn: 新住户什么时候搬进这所房子？

sentence.text: I think that they'll move in the day after tomorrow.
sentence.textCn: 我想他们后天搬进来吧。

sentence.text: Will you see Ian today, Jenny?
sentence.textCn: 珍妮，您今天会见到伊恩吗？

sentence.text: Poor Ian! He didn't want to leave this house.
sentence.textCn: 可怜的伊恩！他本不想离开这房子。

sentence.text: No, he didn't want to leave, but his wife did!
sentence.textCn: 是啊，他是不想离开，可是他妻子要离开。
